languages.text: {n}Вы изящно — по крайней мере, вам так сам{mf|ому|ой} кажется — перегибаетесь через парапет и ловите амасек ртом. Пораженный виночерпий с грохотом роняет кубки. Остальным желающим выпить придется подождать — или последовать вашему блистательному примеру.{/n}

{n}You lean over the parapet with elegance, or what feels like it, and catch the amasec in your mouth. The dumbstruck servant sends the cups crashing to the ground. Anyone else who wants a drink will have to wait, or else follow your brilliant example.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы изящно — по крайней мере, вам так сам{mf|ому|ой} кажется — перегибаетесь через парапет и ловите амасек ртом. Пораженный виночерпий с грохотом роняет кубки. Остальным желающим выпить придется подождать — или последовать вашему блистательному примеру.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You lean over the parapet with elegance, or what feels like it, and catch the amasec with your mouth. The dumbstruck cup-bearer sends the cups crashing to the ground. Anyone else who wants a drink will have to wait, or else follow your brilliant example.{/n}

{n}You lean over the parapet with elegance, or what feels like it, and catch the amasec with your mouth. The dumbstruck cup-bearer sends the cups crashing to the ground. Anyone else who wants a drink will have to wait, or else follow your brilliant example.{/n}

{n}You lean over the parapet with elegance, or what feels like it, and catch the amasec in your mouth. The dumbstruck servant sends the cups crashing to the ground. Anyone else who wants a drink will have to wait, or else follow your brilliant example.{/n}

{n}You lean over the parapet with elegance, or what feels like it, and catch the amasec in your mouth. The dumbstruck servant sends the cups crashing to the ground. Anyone else who wants a drink will have to wait, or else follow your brilliant example.{/n}

{n}You lean over the parapet with elegance, or what feels like it, and catch the amasec in your mouth. The dumbstruck servant sends the cups crashing to the ground. Anyone else who wants a drink will have to wait, or else follow your brilliant example.{/n}

{n}You lean over the parapet with elegance, or what feels like it, and catch the amasec in your mouth. The dumbstruck servant sends the cups crashing to the ground. Anyone else who wants a drink will have to wait, or else follow your brilliant example.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你优雅地跨过了护栏，或者随便优不优雅都好，一头扎进喷泉喝了起来。仆人惊得目瞪口呆，手里的杯子都掉在了地上。所有其他想喝酒的客人都只能先等着，若是不想等，就只能效仿你的做法。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You lean over the parapet with elegance, or what feels like it, and catch the amasec in your mouth. The dumbstruck servant sends the cups crashing to the ground. Anyone else who wants a drink will have to wait, or else follow your brilliant example.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你优雅地跨过了护栏，或者随便优不优雅都好，一头扎进喷泉喝了起来。仆人惊得目瞪口呆，手里的杯子都掉在了地上。所有其他想喝酒的客人都只能先等着，若是不想等，就只能效仿你的做法。{/n}

languages.text: {n}優雅に―少なくとも自分ではそう感じながら―手すり壁から身を乗り出し、アマセックを口で受け止めた。給仕は呆然として、手にしていた杯を地面に落とし、ガシャンと音を立てて砕いてしまった。飲みたがっている他の者は、順番を待つか、あなたの見事な手本に倣うしかない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You lean over the parapet with elegance, or what feels like it, and catch the amasec in your mouth. The dumbstruck servant sends the cups crashing to the ground. Anyone else who wants a drink will have to wait, or else follow your brilliant example.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}優雅に―少なくとも自分ではそう感じながら―手すり壁から身を乗り出し、アマセックを口で受け止めた。給仕は呆然として、手にしていた杯を地面に落とし、ガシャンと音を立てて砕いてしまった。飲みたがっている他の者は、順番を待つか、あなたの見事な手本に倣うしかない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Te inclinas por encima del pretil con elegancia (o eso crees) y sitúas la boca bajo el chorro de amasec. El demudado paje deja caer las copas, que se hacen añicos contra el suelo. Quien quiera beber tendrá que esperar... o imitar tu ocurrente ejemplo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You lean over the parapet with elegance, or what feels like it, and catch the amasec in your mouth. The dumbstruck servant sends the cups crashing to the ground. Anyone else who wants a drink will have to wait, or else follow your brilliant example.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Te inclinas por encima del pretil con elegancia (o eso crees) y sitúas la boca bajo el chorro de amasec. El demudado paje deja caer las copas, que se hacen añicos contra el suelo. Quien quiera beber tendrá que esperar... o imitar tu ocurrente ejemplo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Korkuluğa zarafetle ya da sana öyle gelen bir şekilde eğiliyor ve ağzını akan amaseke uzatıyorsun. Şaşkına dönen saki, kadehleri yere düşürüp kırıyor. Başka içmek isteyen varsa beklemek ya da seni örnek alıp yaptığını yapmak zorunda kalacak.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You lean over the parapet with elegance, or what feels like it, and catch the amasec in your mouth. The dumbstruck servant sends the cups crashing to the ground. Anyone else who wants a drink will have to wait, or else follow your brilliant example.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Korkuluğa zarafetle ya da sana öyle gelen bir şekilde eğiliyor ve ağzını akan amaseke uzatıyorsun. Şaşkına dönen saki, kadehleri yere düşürüp kırıyor. Başka içmek isteyen varsa beklemek ya da seni örnek alıp yaptığını yapmak zorunda kalacak.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous vous penchez sur le parapet avec élégance – ou du moins vous l'espérez – et buvez directement à la fontaine d'amasec. Le serviteur, stupéfait, en fait tomber ses coupes. Tous ceux qui souhaitent boire devront attendre ou suivre votre brillant exemple.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You lean over the parapet with elegance, or what feels like it, and catch the amasec in your mouth. The dumbstruck servant sends the cups crashing to the ground. Anyone else who wants a drink will have to wait, or else follow your brilliant example.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous vous penchez sur le parapet avec élégance – ou du moins vous l'espérez – et buvez directement à la fontaine d'amasec. Le serviteur, stupéfait, en fait tomber ses coupes. Tous ceux qui souhaitent boire devront attendre ou suivre votre brillant exemple.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du lehnst dich elegant über das Geländer und lässt den Amasec in deinen Mund laufen. Der sprachlose Diener lässt die Becher klirrend zu Boden fallen. Wer sonst noch ein Getränk möchte, muss warten oder deinem genialen Beispiel folgen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You lean over the parapet with elegance, or what feels like it, and catch the amasec in your mouth. The dumbstruck servant sends the cups crashing to the ground. Anyone else who wants a drink will have to wait, or else follow your brilliant example.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du lehnst dich elegant über das Geländer und lässt den Amasec in deinen Mund laufen. Der sprachlose Diener lässt die Becher klirrend zu Boden fallen. Wer sonst noch ein Getränk möchte, muss warten oder deinem genialen Beispiel folgen.{/n}
